name: SolarEdge Technologies, Inc.
description: SolarEdge Technologies, Inc. is a leading provider of power optimizer, solar inverter, and monitoring solutions for photovoltaic (PV) systems. Founded in 2006 and headquartered in Herzliya, Israel, SolarEdge has revolutionized the solar energy industry with its innovative technology that maximizes the energy output of solar panels while ensuring safety and reliability. The company’s proprietary technology includes power optimizers that enhance energy harvest at the module level, and its advanced inverters convert the direct current (DC) electricity generated by solar panels into alternating current (AC) for use in homes and businesses. SolarEdge is committed to making solar energy more accessible and efficient, enabling homeowners and businesses to reduce their energy costs and carbon footprint. In addition to its inverter and optimizer technologies, SolarEdge offers a range of smart energy solutions, including energy storage systems and monitoring applications that provide real-time insights into energy production and consumption. With a strong focus on innovation and sustainability, SolarEdge is dedicated to driving the adoption of renewable energy globally.
